about_the_game:
Come on in, our future fellow tanker! We've prepared a hearty welcome package for you to start your epic career in WoT Blitz!
This bundle includes:
• 1 Thunder and Lightning Rare camo certificate
• 500,000 credits
• 3 days of Premium Account

First of all, don this stylish Rare camo (you can also keep it for the future). What's good about this camo is that you don't have to pay to replenish it after battle!

Now, look at these credits. It's not a lot, but this amount will cover many battles. Remember, in WoT Blitz you don't spend credits in battles, you earn them! Your tank is repaired for free. Your primary ammo is replenished for free as well! And there will be many more credits, especially when you get the hang of fighting!

And, finally, with bonus Premium Account days your credits and XP earnings will boost 50% for each battle! Use this time efficiently, and you'll end with a decent credits stash. And when the Premium time ends, what's then, you might ask? Well, you won't feel any discomfort in battles, while there are lots of options of getting some Premium time for free: participate in events, complete Missions and Personal Quests — and you're golden!

Your primary ammo is replenished for free as well! And there will be many more credits, especially when you get the hang of fighting!

And, finally, with bonus Premium Account days your credits and XP earnings will boost 50% for each battle! Use this time efficiently, and you'll end with a decent credits stash. Well, you won't feel any discomfort in battles, while there are lots of options of getting some Premium time for free: participate in events, complete Missions and Personal Quests — and you're golden!

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac OS X 10.9 supported models:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.0, 8.1, 10 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compliant video card with 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to World of Tanks Blitz — a free-to-play game with a positive economy and fair battle conditions for each and every player! Grab this FREE bundle with gorgeous camouflage, a whole tankload of credits, and 3 days of Premium Account and dive into action!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
